Climate Policy Initiative (CPI) bụ otu nyocha nọrọ onwe ha na-enweghị uru na nzukọ iwu ihu igwe nke mba ụwa nke dị na San Francisco, California na ọfịs ndị ọzọ n'ụwa niile. CPI na-akwado nke ọma site na òtù ndị ọrụ ebere na ego mmepe gọọmentị.

Site na ihe karịrị otu nari ndị nyocha na ndị ndụmọdụ, ụlọ ọrụ na-eche echiche ihu igwe na-arụ ọrụ iji melite ike na iwu iji ala eme ihe gburugburu ụwa, na-elekwasị anya na ego. A na-ewere ya dị ka otu ndị ọkachamara na-eduzi n'ịgbaso ego ihu igwe mba ụwa.
Malite na Landscape of Climate Finance (2011), CPI ebipụtala usoro akụkọ kwa afọ nke na-enyocha maka ego ọha na eze na nke onwe na mb ụwa niile

CPI na-ebipụtakwa nyocha ikpe miri emi banyere ịhazi ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze nke itinye ego onwe onye. 
Ka ọ na-erule 2021, CPI kọrọ na ego metụtara ihu igwe na n'etiti mba na-eme naanị ihe dị ka 0.7% nke GDP ụwa, nke dị ala karịa ego a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-adị mkpa maka mbelata ihu igwe na mgbanwe. San Giorgio Group (SGG), otu ọrụ nke CPI na ndị ọzọ guzobere na 2011, na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ ego nwere ike ịkwado itinye ego na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ.
E kwesịghị ịgbagwoju atụmatụ iwu ihu igwe anya na atụmatụ iwu na ọchịchị mgbanwe ihu igwe (ICCG), nke bụbu (ruo 2017) International Center for Climate Governance.

Thomas Heller guzobere na 2009, CPI nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ha na San Francisco (United States). O nwekwara ọfịs na Rio de Janeiro (Brazil), New Delhi (India), Jakarta (Indonesia), na London (United Kingdom).
N'afọ 2020, onye isi nchịkwa ụwa nke Climate Policy Institute bụ Barbara Buchner.
CPI ebipụtala ihe dị ka ọmụmụ 200 na mpaghara nyocha ndị edepụtara na mbụ, ọkachasị na oyibo, na ụfọdụ na Portuguese na Bahasa Indonesia (Malay)
A nwere ike ibudata ọmụmụ ihe ndị a na ibe weebụ ha biputara.
